title: Is the Texas Abortion Law PERFECT? Plus Fauci Emails & Covid LIES!
description:
Crowder goes through the good and the bad in the Texas abortion law, and it isn't TOTALLY perfect. Plus new NIH docs and old Fauci emails reveal his lies about Covid and the Wuhan lab.
